text: Luis Ricardo Villalobos Hernández (born 26 June 1998) is a Mexican cyclist, provisionally suspended from the sport due to an adverse analytical finding (AAF) for GHRP-6 in 2019. Villalobos joined in July 2019, after two-and-a-half seasons with the team. He was provisionally suspended by the Union Cycliste Internationale (UCI) and indefinitely suspended by in May 2020 following an Adverse Analytical Finding (AAF), which suggested he had been doping during his time at . ==Major results== ;2014 : National Novice Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial ;2015 : 1st 15px Road race, Pan American Junior Road Championships : National Junior Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 5th Overall Tour de l'Abitibi ;2016 : Pan American Junior Road Championships ::1st 15px Time trial ::2nd 15px Road race : National Junior Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 2nd Overall Sint-Martinusprijs Kontich ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st Stage 2 : 2nd Overall Niedersachsen–Rundfahrt : 7th Overall Oberösterreich Juniorenrundfahrt ;2017 : 1st 20px Young rider classification Cascade Cycling Classic : 2nd Time trial, National Road Championships : 2nd Road race, National Under-23 Road Championships ;2018 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships : 5th Chrono Kristin Armstrong : 8th Overall Tour of Utah ::1st 20px Young rider classification ;2019 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships : 3rd Winston-Salem Cycling Classic ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male cyclists
title: Luis Villalobos (cyclist)
